Package tage.networking.server

Class AbstractGameConnectionServer<K>

java.lang.Object
tage.networking.AbstractGameConnection
tage.networking.server.AbstractGameConnectionServer<K>
Type Parameters:
K - the key type used to identify each client (such as UUID)
All Implemented Interfaces:
IGameConnection, IGameConnectionServer
Direct Known Subclasses:
GameConnectionServer
public abstract class AbstractGameConnectionServer<K> extends AbstractGameConnection implements IGameConnectionServer
Abstract class to define the protected methods necessary for a game connection server.
Author:
Kyle Matz Modified from the SAGE Networking package for the RAGE game engine by Juan E. Ruiz. Ported to TAGE by Scott Gordon.
